text: Pelosi on the Trump admin filing a brief asking SCOTUS to strike down the entirety of Obamacare: "Trump and the Republicans' campaign to rip away the protections and benefits of the Affordable Care Act in the middle of the coronavirus crisis is an act of unfathomable cruelty."
